abilities.description: Magellan's ultimate forbidden technique where he covers himself in crimson-red poison and creates a massive devil-like entity made of extremely toxic poison. The poison is so potent it can destroy anything it touches, even non-organic materials like Galdino's wax, and spreads like a disease. Magellan claims it can destroy all of Impel Down.
abilities.limitations: The technique appears to be extremely taxing and is considered a 'forbidden move' (kinjite), suggesting it may have drawbacks or costs for Magellan to use.

keyMoments.title: Venom Demon: Jigoku no Shinpan Unleashed
keyMoments.description: Magellan reveals his ultimate technique, transforming into a massive crimson poison demon that threatens to destroy the entire prison.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the true terrifying upper limits of the Doku Doku no Mi's power.

keyMoments.title: Poison Overcomes Wax
keyMoments.description: Magellan's poison proves strong enough to melt through Galdino's hardened wax, demonstrating its overwhelming potency.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the poison can affect even materials designed to be resistant, highlighting its deadly nature.

reveals.information: The Doku Doku no Mi has an ultimate forbidden technique called Venom Demon that can destroy an entire prison

keyMoments.title: Wax Armor for Luffy
keyMoments.description: Galdino creates wax armor coating for Luffy's arms and legs, allowing him to fight Magellan without being poisoned.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the wax's protective qualities and tactical applications in combat.

keyMoments.title: Wax Limitations Revealed
keyMoments.description: Galdino's wax begins to melt under Magellan's most potent poison, showing the material has limits.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes that the wax, while strong, cannot withstand the most extreme Devil Fruit powers.

reveals.information: Galdino's wax can be melted by Magellan's strongest poisons, particularly Venom Demon

abilities.description: A combination technique where Luffy's arms are coated in Galdino's wax before using Gomu Gomu no Gatling, allowing him to attack poison users without contamination.
abilities.limitations: Requires cooperation with Galdino and the wax can melt under extreme poison.

abilities.description: A combination technique where Luffy uses a Stamp attack with wax coating on his foot.
abilities.limitations: Proved ineffective against Magellan's Venom Demon as the wax melted.

keyMoments.title: Champion Gatling Debut
keyMoments.description: Luffy debuts the Champion Gatling technique, combining his rubber powers with Galdino's wax to attack Magellan.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Luffy's adaptability and willingness to use combination attacks with allies.

abilities.description: Ivankov can use hormones to partially heal himself from severe exhaustion and injuries, allowing him to recover enough strength to assist in critical moments.
abilities.limitations: The healing is partial and may not fully restore the user, as seen when Ivankov remains weakened despite recovery.

keyMoments.title: Ivankov's Partial Recovery
keyMoments.description: Ivankov uses his hormone powers to partially heal himself from the severe exhaustion caused by healing Luffy's poison.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the self-application capabilities of the Horu Horu no Mi.

keyMoments.title: Hell Wink Escape Launch
keyMoments.description: Ivankov enlarges his head and uses Hell Wink to propel all the prisoners out of Impel Down.
keyMoments.significance: Shows how Ivankov's hormone-enhanced physical transformations enable impossible feats.

reveals.information: The Horu Horu no Mi can be used for self-healing through hormone manipulation
